name: Ol' Reliable
description: SpongeBob slapping his spatula, 'Ol' Reliable', used to show trust in something reliable

text_areas.usage: The reliable solution/thing (goes on the spatula box)

usage_rules: CONTEXT: SpongeBob proudly shows his spatula 'Ol' Reliable' when he needs something trustworthy
TOP TEXT: Describe a complex problem or situation that needs solving (usually starts with 'When...')
BOTTOM TEXT: The simple, tried-and-true solution you always fall back on
IMPORTANT: The bottom text goes IN THE WHITE LABEL on the spatula box, not below the image
TONE: Affectionate nostalgia for simple solutions that just work
BEST FOR: Celebrating basic tools/methods that consistently solve complex problems
cultural_context: From SpongeBob SquarePants S2E15 where SpongeBob shows his trusty spatula. The meme celebrates returning to simple, reliable solutions when faced with complex problems. The humor comes from the contrast between the problem's complexity and the solution's simplicity.
text_positioning_note: The 'solution' text MUST be placed in the white label area on the spatula box (75-85% down from top), NOT as a caption below the image. This is what makes it look like the spatula's actual name.
